mapper.select: SELECT count(1) cnt FROM ( SELECT 'User' AS Type , GM.UserCode AS Code , IFNULL(UR.DisplayName, '') AS CodeName , IFNULL(UR.MailAddress, '') AS MailAddress , GM.GroupMemberID AS MemberID FROM sys_object_group_member AS GM LEFT JOIN sys_object_user AS UR ON GM.UserCode = UR.UserCode WHERE GM.GroupCode = #{AuthType} UNION SELECT 'Dept' AS Type , GM.MemberGroupCode AS Code , IFNULL(GR.DisplayName, '') AS CodeName , IFNULL(GR.PrimaryMail, '') AS MailAddress , GM.MemberGroupID AS MemberID FROM sys_object_group_membergroup AS GM LEFT JOIN sys_object_group AS GR ON GM.MemberGroupCode = GR.GroupCode WHERE GM.GroupCode = #{AuthType} ) AS A WHERE Code = #{UserCode}

SELECT distinct ams.SchSeq, SchName, AttDayStartTime, AttDayEndTime , concat(ams.StartSunHour,':',StartSunMin,'~',EndSunHour,':',EndSunMin) WorkTimeSun , concat(ams.StartMonHour,':',StartMonMin,'~',EndMonHour,':',EndMonMin) WorkTimeMon , concat(ams.StartTueHour,':',StartTueMin,'~',EndTueHour,':',EndTueMin) WorkTimeTue , concat(ams.StartWedHour,':',StartWedMin,'~',EndWedHour,':',EndWedMin) WorkTimeWed , concat(ams.StartThuHour,':',StartThuMin,'~',EndThuHour,':',EndThuMin) WorkTimeThu , concat(ams.StartFriHour,':',StartFriMin,'~',EndFriHour,':',EndFriMin) WorkTimeFri , concat(ams.StartSatHour,':',StartSatMin,'~',EndSatHour,':',EndSatMin) WorkTimeSat , case when NextDayYnSun = 'Y' then fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartSunHour,StartSunMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200102',EndSunHour,EndSunMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) else fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartSunHour,StartSunMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200101',EndSunHour,EndSunMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) end AcTimeSun , case when NextDayYnMon = 'Y' then fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartMonHour,StartMonMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200102',EndMonHour,EndMonMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) else fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartMonHour,StartMonMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200101',EndMonHour,EndMonMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) end AcTimeMon , case when NextDayYnTue = 'Y' then fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartTueHour,StartTueMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200102',EndTueHour,EndTueMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) else fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartTueHour,StartTueMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200101',EndTueHour,EndTueMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) end AcTimeTue , case when NextDayYnWed = 'Y' then fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartWedHour,StartWedMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200102',EndWedHour,EndWedMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) else fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartWedHour,StartWedMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200101',EndWedHour,EndWedMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) end AcTimeWed , case when NextDayYnThu = 'Y' then fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartThuHour,StartThuMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200102',EndThuHour,EndThuMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) else fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartThuHour,StartThuMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200101',EndThuHour,EndThuMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) end AcTimeThu , case when NextDayYnFri = 'Y' then fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartFriHour,StartFriMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200102',EndFriHour,EndFriMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) else fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartFriHour,StartFriMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200101',EndFriHour,EndFriMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) end AcTimeFri , case when NextDayYnSat = 'Y' then fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartSatHour,StartSatMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200102',EndSatHour,EndSatMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) else fn_attend_getAttDayACTime(str_to_date(concat('20200101',StartSatHour,StartSatMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), str_to_date(concat('20200101',EndSatHour,EndSatMin),'%Y%m%d%H%i')) end AcTimeSat FROM attendance_mng_schedule ams LEFT JOIN ( select AllocSEQ, SchSeq, AllocType, AllocID, GroupCode, GroupPath from attendance_mng_schedule_alloc a LEFT JOIN (select CompanyCode, GroupType, GroupCode, GroupPath from sys_object_group) sog ON sog.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} AND GroupType = 'Dept' AND GroupCode <> a.AllocID AND GroupPath like CONCAT('%',a.AllocID,';%') ) amsa ON ams.SchSeq = amsa.SchSeq
AND ((amsa.AllocType = 'UR' AND amsa.AllocID=#{UserCode} ) OR (amsa.AllocType != 'UR' AND (amsa.GroupCode=#{DeptID} OR amsa.AllocID=#{DeptID})) )
AND amsa.AllocType != 'UR' AND (amsa.GroupCode=#{DeptID} OR amsa.AllocID=#{DeptID})
WHERE ams.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}
AND ams.SchName like concat ('%',#{SchName},'%')
AND ams.ValidYn = 'Y'
AND (ams.BaseYn = 'Y' OR (((amsa.AllocType = 'UR' AND amsa.AllocID=#{UserCode} ) OR (amsa.AllocType != 'UR' AND (amsa.GroupCode=#{DeptID} OR amsa.AllocID=#{DeptID})) ) ))
AND (ams.BaseYn = 'Y' OR ( amsa.AllocType != 'UR' AND (amsa.GroupCode=#{DeptID} OR amsa.AllocID=#{DeptID}) ))

SELECT count(1) cnt FROM ( SELECT 'User' AS Type , GM.UserCode AS Code , IFNULL(UR.DisplayName, '') AS CodeName , IFNULL(UR.MailAddress, '') AS MailAddress , GM.GroupMemberID AS MemberID FROM sys_object_group_member AS GM LEFT JOIN sys_object_user AS UR ON GM.UserCode = UR.UserCode WHERE GM.GroupCode = CONCAT(#{domainID},'_Attendance_Admin') UNION SELECT 'Dept' AS Type , GM.MemberGroupCode AS Code , IFNULL(GR.DisplayName, '') AS CodeName , IFNULL(GR.PrimaryMail, '') AS MailAddress , GM.MemberGroupID AS MemberID FROM sys_object_group_membergroup AS GM LEFT JOIN sys_object_group AS GR ON GM.MemberGroupCode = GR.GroupCode WHERE GM.GroupCode = CONCAT(#{domainID},'Attendance_Admin') ) AS A WHERE Code = #{UserCode}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(aj.JobDate , '%Y-%m-%d') JobDate ,aj.SchSeq SchSeq , ash.SchName SchName , aj.WorkSts WorkSts -- , date_format(case when VacOffFlag like '%AM%' then DATE_ADD(aj.AttDayEndTime,INTERVAL -4 hour) else aj.AttDayStartTime end ,'%H%i') AttDayStartTime -- , date_format(case when VacOffFlag like '%PM%' then DATE_ADD(aj.AttDayEndTime,INTERVAL -4 hour) else aj.AttDayEndTime end,'%H%i') AttDayEndTime , date_format(aj.AttDayStartTime,'%H%i') AttDayStartTime , date_format(aj.AttDayEndTime,'%H%i') AttDayEndTime , WorkSts , aj.ConfmYn , ifnull(VacFlag,'N') VacFlag , VacOffFlag , ifnull(VacDay,0) VacDay , CASE WHEN VacFlag IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT CodeName FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code WHERE DomainID = #{domainID} AND codegroup='VACATION_TYPE' AND CODE=SUBSTRING_INDEX(VacFlag,'|',1)) END CodeName , DATE_FORMAT(am.AttStartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AttStartTime , DATE_FORMAT(am.AttEndTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AttEndTime , am.StartSts, am.EndSts , am.HoliAc , am.ExtenAC , ash.AssYn , aj.AttDayAC FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_job aj LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule ash ON aj.SchSeq = ash.SchSeq LEFT JOIN (SELECT dayList, ur_code , SUM(VacDay) as VacDay , GROUP_CONCAT(vv.VacFlag ORDER BY vv.VacOffFlag SEPARATOR '|') as VacFlag , GROUP_CONCAT(vv.VacOffFlag ORDER BY vv.VacOffFlag SEPARATOR '|') as VacOffFlag FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_daylist d JOIN covi_smart4j.vm_vacationinfo_day vv ON d.dayList = vv.VacDate WHERE vv.UR_Code = #{UR_Code} AND d.dayList BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{StartDate},'01'),'%Y%m%d') AND LAST_DAY( STR_TO_DATE(#{StartDate},'%Y%m')) GROUP BY dayList, ur_code ) vv ON aj.JobDate = vv.dayList LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.attendance_commuting_mst am ON aj.UserCode = am.UserCode AND aj.JobDate = am.TargetDate WHERE aj.UserCode = #{UR_Code} AND aj.JobDate BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SUBSTR(#{StartDate},1,6),'01'),'%Y%m%d') AND LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SUBSTR(#{StartDate},1,6),'01'),'%Y%m%d')) ORDER BY JobDate

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME(NOW(),IFNULL(c.Reserved1,'00:00:00')), #{DateFormat}) UserDateTime FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user u LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_base_code c ON u.TimeZoneCode = c.CODE LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup ub ON ub.UserCode = u.UserCode AND ub.JobType = 'ORIGIN' LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain d ON d.DomainCode = ub.CompanyCode WHERE u.UserCode = #{UserCode} AND c.DomainID = (SELECT DomainID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code WHERE Code = c.Code ORDER BY IF(DomainID = d.DomainID, 0, 1) LIMIT 1 )

SELECT S.LogonID , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, S.MultiDisplayName) AS DisplayName , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, UB.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, UB.MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, UB.MultiJobTitleName) AS JobTitleName , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, UB.MultiJobPositionName) AS JobPositionName , S.Description , S.Birthdate , S.PhoneNumber , S.Mobile , S.Fax , S.PhotoPath , S.MailAddress , S.Address , S.ChargeBusiness FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER S INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP UB ON S.UserCode = UB.UserCode WHERE S.UserCode = #{userId} AND UB.JobType = 'Origin' LIMIT 1
SELECT OverTime, RewardTime FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_mst_reward WHERE CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} AND RewardCode = 'rest' limit 1;
